message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your experience and productivity. Given its high quality and unique features, I suggest an initial price of $150 for this item. I'm confident it's well worth the investment. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. I think it's a great product, but I'm not sure it's worth the full $150. Can you consider my offer?
